title: Blended e-Learning Design Utilizing Chemistry Experimentation Methods and Tools

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational knowledge of secondary chemistry education and basic laboratory skills
context.additional_context: Provision of content optimized for smartphone-based learning for current secondary chemistry teachers, utilizing synchronous/asynchronous interaction and experimental simulation tools

learning_goals: Learners can develop experimental procedures suitable for secondary education settings by applying chemical experiment design principles
Learners can operate virtual lab environments and analyze results using CAT (Computer-Assisted Training) tools
Learners can collaborate with peer learners and instructors via mobile platforms to improve experimental teaching methodologies

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
